operation.name: fuzzyQueryByName
operation.sqlmap: select * from enterprise <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="enterpriseName"> name like concat("%", #enterpriseName#, "%") </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> order by id DESC

operation.name: fuzzyPageQueryByName
operation.sqlmap: select * from enterprise <dynamic prepend="WHERE"> <isNotEmpty prepend="and" property="enterpriseName"> name like concat("%", #enterpriseName#, "%") </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> order by id DESC limit #pageNum#, #pageSize#
